document_data.caption: ''The young Dara was wise beyond her years.''
document_data.name: Dara
document_data.Description:
Dara's appearance was similar to that of any other ten-year-old [[Faerûn]]ian girl. She spoke in a small, mousy voice that contrasted with her profound confidence.

While her physical form was unremarkable, Dara's [[soul]] was said to be wholly pure, and marked with supernatural fortitude.
document_data.Personality: Dara remained entirely focused on taking action to further the mission she was granted by Ilmater. While she would let nothing stand in her way, Dara could be rather single-minded in the execution of that mission.
document_data.Relationships: She always traveled alongside an elder shepherd named [[Ghorin]], and his [[goat]] [[Clyde]]. Ghorin was extremely protective of Dara, and never let her out of his sight. Like Dara, the two companions had more to their characters than their simple appearance let on.

History.Divine Calling:
{{Quote|I know not where you are to go,
Or what you're looking for;
But if He say I make it so,
Then tarry shall we no more. |Dara, singing to her companions.{{Cite adventurers league/The Vast Emptiness of Grace|4}}}}
